info.brief_description: 25 years have passed since the cul-de-sac was last visited; Michael Fairgate returns
info.description:
Pat Petersen who played the youngest Fairgate child, Michael returns to Knot's Landing's famous cul-de-sac after a long absence. He brings along his 15-year old son who is a splitting image of Pat when he was 15 years old. It is not by coincidence that his name is Michael. Both dad and son are dressed in a polo shirt, khaki shorts and Pat wears flops on his bare feet while Michael wears black sport shoes with black socks. They drive into the cul-de-sac and park right in front of his TV house of nearly 15 seasons. They get out and Pat begins to explain to Michael the layout of the show. Just then, Marty, the owner of the house comes out and introduces himself and tells Pat he was a big fan of the show. Marty say that Pat still looks good and looks down at his bare feet and admires them. Pat blushes and introduces his son Michael to Marty.
Marty invites them inside his house which looks quite different then the sound stage mock up of the inside years earlier. Marty asks both of them to remove their footwear since he just had the carpets clean. Pat kicks off his flops and walks barefoot inside. Michael unties his shoes and pulls them off his socked feet and sets them next to his dad's flops.
Marty says to Michael "You can take off your socks too if you wish. I always go barefoot inside and hardly wear shoes" while smiling.
Michael replies "My dad says my feet stink, so I'll keep them on for now" smiling at Marty and walks inside.
A while later after taking a tour of the house, they all emerge in the backyard. There is beautiful pool and hot tub shaded by a gazebo. Michael smiles and asks if he could take a dip. Marty says okay, but warns him that the chlorine might stain his shorts. Michael quickly peels off his black socks, polo shirt and shorts and dives in the pool wearing his speedos. In the process, his boxers slide off leaving Michael naked. Pat and Marty laugh as Michael swims back and retrieves them. Marty tells them that he skinny dips all the time; we're all guys here, so don't worry about it. Michael throws his boxers on a nearby chair and swims in his birthday suit to the deep end. He gets out and climbs onto the diving board. He does a pose and for a moment Pat and Marty are awe struck how gorgeous he looks and how well hung Michael is. His golden tan bare feet with pedicured slender toes glisten in the sunlight. He dives in again as Pat and Marty look on.
